name: Aatrox
summary: Darkin warrior from Targon, known for his formidable presence and demonic sword. Seeks chaos and revenge on the battlefield.

name: Ahri
summary: Vastaya fox-mage from Ionia, manipulates essence to sustain herself. Mysterious and alluring.

name: Akali
summary: Rogue assassin from Ionia, trained in the Kinkou Order. Uses shadows to outmaneuver and eliminate foes.

name: Akshan
summary: Rogue marksman from Shurima. Sworn to avenge his mentor's death, Akshan uses his grappling hook and stealth to outmaneuver enemies.

name: Alistar
summary: Minotaur support from the Freljord. A powerful tank and protector of the herd.

name: Amumu
summary: Sad mummy from Shurima, cursed to bring despair. Seeks friendship despite his gloomy nature.

name: Anivia
summary: Cryophoenix from Freljord, Anivia embodies the elemental magic of ice. Guardian of the Freljord, she seeks to maintain the balance of the world.

name: Annie
summary: Dark child mage from Noxus, Annie wields powerful fire magic. Accompanied by her teddy bear, Tibbers, she is both adorable and deadly.

name: Aphelios
summary: Weapon prodigy from Targon, Aphelios wields five different weapons, each with unique abilities. Master of the moon's power, driven by silent determination.

name: Ashe
summary: Frost Archer and queen of Freljord. Aims to unite tribes against external threats. Masterful with her bow, Frost Shot, and enchanted arrow, Enchanted Crystal Arrow.

name: Aurelion Sol
summary: Celestial dragon from Mount Targon, Aurelion Sol creates and controls stars. Fiercely independent, he crafts the cosmos and maintains balance.

name: Azir
summary: Ascended emperor from Shurima, Azir commands an army of sand soldiers. Driven by ambition, he seeks to restore his fallen empire.

name: Bard
summary: Cosmic caretaker and wanderer. Bard travels the universe, collecting meeps and aiding in the cosmic balance. Mysterious and enigmatic.

name: Blitzcrank
summary: Steam Golem created in Zaun. Blitzcrank serves as a versatile and powerful automaton. Known for his signature Rocket Grab and Static Field.

name: Brand
summary: Eternal Fire from the Freljord, Brand is a destructive elemental force bound to a mortal form. He seeks to engulf the world in eternal flames.

name: Braum
summary: Heart of the Freljord, Braum is a mighty protector known for his enormous shield. A gentle giant with an unwavering sense of duty.

name: Caitlyn
summary: Sheriff of Piltover, Caitlyn is a skilled marksman and detective. She upholds the law in Piltover with her precise aim and relentless pursuit of justice.

name: Camille
summary: Steel Shadow from Piltover, Camille is a highly skilled and ruthless enforcer. Enhanced with hextech, she serves the higher echelons of society with precision and lethal grace.

name: Cassiopeia
summary: Serpentine temptress from Noxus, Cassiopeia was cursed into a half-snake form. She seeks power and vengeance, using her potent venom in battle.

name: Cho'Gath
summary: Void Terror from the Void, Cho'Gath is a massive and insatiable creature. Devouring everything in his path, he grows larger with each feast.

name: Corki
summary: Yordle pilot from Bandle City, Corki is an ace aviator with a love for flying. He engages in aerial combat with his trusty modified aircraft, the ROFLcopter.

name: Darius
summary: Hand of Noxus, Darius is a powerful and ruthless warrior. Armed with a massive axe, he seeks to expand the glory of Noxus on the battlefield.

name: Diana
summary: Scorn of the Moon from Mount Targon, Diana is a fierce and disciplined warrior. Drawn to the moon's power, she wields a crescent blade in the name of the Lunari.

name: Cassiopeia
summary: Serpentine temptress from Noxus, Cassiopeia was cursed into a half-snake form. She seeks power and vengeance, using her potent venom in battle.

name: Cho'Gath
summary: Void Terror from the Void, Cho'Gath is a massive and insatiable creature. Devouring everything in his path, he grows larger with each feast.

name: Corki
summary: Yordle pilot from Bandle City, Corki is an ace aviator with a love for flying. He engages in aerial combat with his trusty modified aircraft, the ROFLcopter.

name: Darius
summary: Hand of Noxus, Darius is a powerful and ruthless warrior. Armed with a massive axe, he seeks to expand the glory of Noxus on the battlefield.

name: Diana
summary: Scorn of the Moon from Mount Targon, Diana is a fierce and disciplined warrior. Drawn to the moon's power, she wields a crescent blade in the name of the Lunari.

name: Draven
summary: Glorious Executioner from Noxus, Draven is a showman in the arena. Master of spinning axes, he craves adoration and lives for the applause of the crowd.

name: Dr. Mundo
summary: Madman of Zaun, Dr. Mundo is a berserker with questionable sanity. Experimented on in Zaun's labs, he wields a massive cleaver and seeks pain and suffering.

name: Ekko
summary: Boy who Shattered Time from Zaun, Ekko is a street-smart inventor. Using a stolen time device, he manipulates time to outplay enemies and right wrongs.

name: Elise
summary: Spider Queen from the Shadow Isles, Elise is a deadly sorceress. She can transform into a giant spider, weaving dark magic and commanding legions of spiders.

name: Evelynn
summary: Agony's Embrace from the Shadow Isles, Evelynn is a seductive and demonic assassin. Cloaked in shadows, she preys on the desires of her victims.

name: Ezreal
summary: Prodigious Explorer from Piltover, Ezreal is an adventurous treasure hunter. Known for his wit and charm, he seeks ancient artifacts and thrives on discovery.

name: Fiddlesticks
summary: Ancient Fear from parts unknown, Fiddlesticks is a nightmarish scarecrow. Awakened after centuries, it brings terror with its haunting presence and deadly magic.

name: Fiora
summary: Grand Duelist from Demacia, Fiora is a master fencer and noble warrior. Seeking perfection in combat, she duels to uphold her family's honor.

name: Fizz
summary: Tidal Trickster from Bilgewater, Fizz is a mischievous yordle. Master of the seas, he uses his agility and tricks to outmaneuver enemies.

name: Galio
summary: Colossus from Demacia, Galio is a gargantuan stone golem. Created to protect Demacia, he transforms to shield allies from harm and punish wrongdoers.

name: Gangplank
summary: Saltwater Scourge from Bilgewater, Gangplank is a ruthless pirate captain. With his ship, the Dead Pool, he commands the seas with terror and brutality.

name: Garen
summary: Might of Demacia, Garen is a powerful and loyal warrior. Known for his unwavering strength and justice, he fights for the glory of Demacia.

name: Gnar
summary: Missing Link from Freljord, Gnar is a yordle transformed by ancient magic. Alternating between adorable yordle and fierce beast, he brings chaos to the battlefield.

name: Gragas
summary: Rabble Rouser from the Freljord, Gragas is a brawling brewmaster. Seeking the perfect brew, he uses his potent concoctions to create chaos in battle.

name: Graves
summary: Outlaw from Bilgewater, Graves is a gritty gunslinger. Betrayed by his partner, he seeks revenge with his trusty shotgun, Destiny, and a thirst for justice.

name: Gwen
summary: Hallowed Seamstress from the Shadow Isles, Gwen is a unique creation brought to life by magic. Animated from a magical doll, she wields a giant pair of scissors, seeking to unravel the mysteries of her existence.

name: Hecarim
summary: Shadow of War from the Shadow Isles, Hecarim is a spectral cavalryman. Led by his thirst for battle, he charges into the fray, trampling enemies beneath his hooves.

name: Heimerdinger
summary: Yordle Inventor from Piltover, Heimerdinger is a brilliant scientist. Armed with his inventions, including turrets and grenades, he defends Piltover with unmatched intellect.

name: Illaoi
summary: Kraken Priestess from Bilgewater, Illaoi is a powerful warrior. Devoted to the goddess Nagakabouros, she uses her tentacle idol to test the strength of others.

name: Irelia
summary: Blade Dancer from Ionia, Irelia is a master of dancing blades. Seeking justice for her homeland, she wields her iconic floating blades with deadly precision.

name: Ivern
summary: Green Father from the Freljord, Ivern is a gentle and nature-loving spirit. He roams the forest, spreading life and kindness to all creatures.

name: Janna
summary: Storm's Fury from Zaun, Janna is an elemental sorceress. Harnessing the power of wind, she protects the innocent and maintains balance in the world.

name: Jarvan IV
summary: Exemplar of Demacia, Jarvan IV is a noble prince. Leading with honor, he fights to defend Demacia and uphold the ideals of justice and loyalty.

name: Jax
summary: Grandmaster at Arms from Icathia, Jax is a powerful and mysterious warrior. Armed with a lamppost, he seeks formidable opponents to challenge his combat skills.

name: Jayce
summary: Defender of Tomorrow from Piltover, Jayce is a brilliant inventor. Wielding his transforming Mercury Hammer and Mercury Cannon, he fights for a brighter future.

name: Jhin
summary: Virtuoso from Ionia, Jhin is a meticulous and artistic assassin. Obsessed with perfection, he turns each kill into a carefully crafted masterpiece.

name: Jinx
summary: Loose Cannon from Piltover, Jinx is a manic and unpredictable criminal. Known for her chaotic and explosive tendencies, she wreaks havoc in Piltover and enjoys every moment of mayhem.

name: Kai'Sa
summary: Daughter of the Void from Shurima, Kai'Sa is a Void marksman. Struggling for survival, she merges with a Void creature to become a powerful and adaptive hunter.

name: Kalista
summary: Spear of Vengeance from the Shadow Isles, Kalista is a spectral marksman. Bound by vengeance, she seeks to fulfill oaths and bring justice to betrayers.

name: Karma
summary: Enlightened One from Ionia, Karma is a serene and powerful mage. Channeling the spirit of Ionia, she uses her mantra to empower allies and bring balance.

name: Karthus
summary: Deathsinger from the Shadow Isles, Karthus is a powerful lich. Devoted to the pursuit of death, he unleashes devastating magic to consume his enemies.

name: Kassadin
summary: Voidwalker from the Void, Kassadin is a determined seeker of forbidden knowledge. Transformed by the Void, he wields anti-magic to combat its influence.

name: Katarina
summary: Sinister Blade from Noxus, Katarina is an agile assassin. Renowned for her deadly skills, she revels in chaos and carnage on the battlefield.

name: Kayle
summary: Righteous from Demacia, Kayle is a celestial warrior. Empowered by divine forces, she wields a magical sword to bring justice and order to the world.

name: Kayn
summary: Shadow Reaper from Ionia, Kayn is a versatile assassin. Bound to the sentient weapon Rhaast, he struggles with the balance of power within him.

name: Kennen
summary: Heart of the Tempest from Ionia, Kennen is a yordle ninja. Harnessing electrical energy, he strikes with lightning-fast agility to protect his homeland.

name: Kha'Zix
summary: Voidreaver from the Void, Kha'Zix is an adaptive predator. Evolving with each kill, he hunts powerful prey to assimilate their strengths.

name: Kindred
summary: Eternal Hunters from the spirit realm, Kindred is a duo of mystical beings. Lamb, the gentle guide, and Wolf, the relentless hunter, seek those at the end of life.

name: Kled
summary: Cantankerous Cavalier from Noxus, Kled is a relentless warrior. Mounted on his trusty steed, Skaarl, he charges into battle with reckless abandon.

name: Kog'Maw
summary: Mouth of the Abyss from the Void, Kog'Maw is a voracious voidborn. Consuming everything in its path, Kog'Maw spews out corrosive ooze and explosive projectiles.

name: LeBlanc
summary: Deceiver from Noxus, LeBlanc is a manipulative sorceress. Skilled in illusions and duplicity, she serves the Black Rose and weaves chaos in the political landscape.

name: Lee Sin
summary: Blind Monk from Ionia, Lee Sin is a martial artist. Despite his blindness, he navigates the world with incredible senses and unmatched combat prowess.

name: Leona
summary: Radiant Dawn from Mount Targon, Leona is a radiant warrior. Chosen by the sun, she wields the power of light to defend Targon and uphold justice.

name: Lillia
summary: Bashful Bloom from Ionia, Lillia is a dreamy and magical entity. Connected to the spirit realm, she roams through dreams and the world, spreading tranquility.

name: Lissandra
summary: Ice Witch from the Freljord, Lissandra is a powerful sorceress. Manipulating ice and dark magic, she seeks to control the world and plunge it into eternal winter.

name: Lucian
summary: Purifier from Demacia, Lucian is a relentless marksman. Driven by vengeance, he hunts the undead and wields dual relic pistols with deadly accuracy.

name: Lulu
summary: Fae Sorceress from Bandle City, Lulu is a mischievous yordle. Gifted with magical powers, she uses whimsical spells to enchant and disrupt the battlefield.

name: Lux
summary: Lady of Luminosity from Demacia, Lux is a radiant mage. Harnessing light magic, she protects Demacia with her dazzling abilities and unwavering sense of justice.

name: Malphite
summary: Shard of the Monolith from Icathia, Malphite is a colossal rock elemental. Seeking harmony, he opposes those who would disturb the balance of the natural world.

name: Malzahar
summary: Prophet of the Void from the Void, Malzahar is a seer corrupted by the Void. His visions guide him to unravel the mysteries of the cosmos and spread the Void's influence.

name: Maokai
summary: Twisted Treant from the Shadow Isles, Maokai is a vengeful nature spirit. Infused with dark magic, he seeks to cleanse the Shadow Isles of corruption.

name: Master Yi
summary: Wuju Bladesman from Ionia, Master Yi is a disciplined martial artist. Mastering the art of Wuju, he seeks enlightenment and hones his skills as a blade master.

name: Miss Fortune
summary: Bounty Hunter from Bilgewater, Miss Fortune is a deadly marksman. Driven by revenge, she seeks to reclaim her position and fortune among the criminal underworld.

name: Mordekaiser
summary: Iron Revenant from the Shadow Isles, Mordekaiser is a powerful warlord. Forged into an unstoppable juggernaut, he seeks to conquer and dominate all in his path.

name: Morgana
summary: Fallen Angel from Demacia, Morgana is a fallen celestial being. Embracing dark magic, she rebels against her kin to bring justice to the oppressed.

name: Nami
summary: Tidecaller from the Marai, Nami is a benevolent aquatic mage. Guided by the moonstone, she protects her people and maintains balance in the seas.

name: Nasus
summary: Curator of the Sands from Shurima, Nasus is an ascended being. Preserving ancient knowledge, he wields the power of the sands to defend Shurima.

name: Nautilus
summary: Titan of the Depths from the Freljord, Nautilus is a colossal sea titan. Ensnared by dark magic, he seeks those responsible for his transformation and wreaks havoc on the seas.

name: Neeko
summary: Curious Chameleon from the Vastaya, Neeko is a magical shapeshifter. Mimicking the forms of others, she brings both whimsy and cunning to the battlefield.

name: Nidalee
summary: Bestial Huntress from the Kumungu Jungle, Nidalee is a primal huntress. Shapeshifting between human and cougar forms, she defends her territory with primal instincts.

name: Nocturne
summary: Eternal Nightmare from the Shadow Isles, Nocturne is a haunting entity. Feeding on fear, he plunges the world into darkness and terrorizes the dreams of the living.

name: Nunu & Willump
summary: Boy and Yeti from the Freljord, Nunu and Willump are inseparable companions. Embarking on adventures, they bring joy to the harsh lands of the Freljord.

name: Olaf
summary: Berserker from the Freljord, Olaf is a fearsome warrior. Driven by the thrill of battle, he seeks glory and challenges the strongest opponents.

name: Orianna
summary: Lady of Clockwork from Piltover, Orianna is an artificial being. Bound to a clockwork body, she dances gracefully and brings harmony to the City of Progress.

name: Ornn
summary: Fire below the Mountain from the Freljord, Ornn is a powerful blacksmith. Crafting legendary items, he roams the Freljord, creating masterpieces and facing mighty foes.

name: Pantheon
summary: Unbreakable Spear from Mount Targon, Pantheon is a steadfast warrior. Chosen by the Aspect of War, he wields a celestial spear to protect the mortal realm.

name: Poppy
summary: Keeper of the Hammer from Demacia, Poppy is a determined yordle. Wielding the legendary hammer, Whomper, she seeks to fulfill her duties as the Keeper of the Hammer.

name: Pyke
summary: Drowned Man from Bilgewater, Pyke is a vengeful revenant. Betrayed and transformed by the deep, he hunts down those who have wronged him on the high seas.

name: Qiyana
summary: Empress of the Elements from Ixtal, Qiyana is a skilled elemental assassin. Controlling the power of the land, she seeks to assert her dominance and rule Ixtal.

name: Quinn
summary: Demacia's Wings from Demacia, Quinn is an elite ranger. Teaming up with her eagle, Valor, she scouts the battlefield and defends Demacia with precision and speed.

name: Rakan
summary: Charmer from Ionia, Rakan is a flamboyant vastaya. Partnered with Xayah, the Rebel, he dances into battle and dazzles enemies with his acrobatic style.

name: Rammus
summary: Armordillo from Shurima, Rammus is a resilient creature. Covered in spiked armor, he rolls into foes, taunting and disrupting enemies with his defensive prowess.

name: Rek'Sai
summary: Void Burrower from the Void, Rek'Sai is a relentless predator. Tunneling through the ground, she hunts down prey and disrupts the battlefield with her ferocity.

name: Rell
summary: Iron Maiden from Noxus, Rell is a formidable tank. Forged in iron, she controls metal and shapes it into powerful weapons to defend her allies and seek justice.

name: Renekton
summary: Butcher of the Sands from Shurima, Renekton is a savage warrior. Transformed by the sun's fury, he wields a massive blade and seeks vengeance in the desert.

name: Rengar
summary: Pridestalker from the Vastaya, Rengar is a fearsome hunter. Driven by the thrill of the hunt, he stalks powerful prey and collects trophies as a testament to his skill.

name: Riven
summary: Exile from Ionia, Riven is a masterful swordswoman. Broken by betrayal, she wields a broken sword and seeks redemption on the battlefield.

name: Rumble
summary: Mechanical Menace from Bandle City, Rumble is a brilliant inventor. Riding his powerful mech, Tristy, he brings chaos to the battlefield with his explosive gadgets.

name: Ryze
summary: Rogue Mage from the Freljord, Ryze is a powerful mage. Wielding ancient arcane runes, he seeks to unlock the secrets of the world and prevent its destruction.

name: Samira
summary: Daredevil from Shurima, Samira is a skilled marksman. Fueled by adrenaline, she seeks the ultimate challenge, taking on the most dangerous foes with her flashy style.

name: Sejuani
summary: Winter's Wrath from the Freljord, Sejuani is a fierce warleader. Riding her drüvask boar, Bristle, she commands the Winter's Wrath and seeks to unite the tribes of the Freljord.

name: Senna
summary: Redeemer from Demacia, Senna is a marksman empowered by light. Freed from Thresh's lantern, she wields a relic cannon to bring justice to the Shadow Isles.

name: Seraphine
summary: Starry-Eyed Songstress from Piltover, Seraphine is a musical mage. Harnessing the power of sound, she seeks to unite the people of Piltover and Zaun through her music.

name: Sett
summary: Boss from Ionia, Sett is a powerful pit fighter. Determined to rise to the top, he uses his exceptional strength and combat skills to dominate the fighting pits.

name: Shaco
summary: Demon Jester from parts unknown, Shaco is a sinister jester. Spreading chaos with his deceptive tricks and deadly shiv, he revels in the madness he creates.

name: Shen
summary: Eye of Twilight from Ionia, Shen is a disciplined ninja. Protector of balance, he wields a mystical blade and travels between realms to uphold justice and peace.

name: Shyvana
summary: Half-Dragon from Demacia, Shyvana is a powerful dragon-hybrid. Born of fire and fury, she defends Demacia and harnesses the power of dragonkind in battle.

name: Singed
summary: Mad Chemist from Zaun, Singed is a deranged alchemist. Leaving a trail of toxic fumes, he seeks to perfect his experiments and revels in chaos.

name: Sion
summary: Undead Juggernaut from Noxus, Sion is an unstoppable force. Reanimated with dark magic, he charges into battle, smashing enemies and leaving destruction in his wake.

name: Sivir
summary: Battle Mistress from Shurima, Sivir is a skilled mercenary. Wielding the legendary crossblade, Boomerang Blade, she seeks fortune and glory on the battlefield.

name: Skarner
summary: Crystal Vanguard from the Crystal Scar, Skarner is a guardian of the Brackern. Protecting his kind, he uses crystal magic to control the battlefield and defend the sacred spires.

name: Sona
summary: Maven of the Strings from Demacia, Sona is a mute musician. Using enchanted melodies, she heals allies and disrupts enemies, bringing harmony to the battlefield.

name: Soraka
summary: Starchild from Mount Targon, Soraka is a celestial healer. Sacrificing her immortality, she walks among mortals to bring compassion and healing to the world.

name: Swain
summary: Noxian Grand General from Noxus, Swain is a strategic mastermind. Possessed by a demon, he commands the military might of Noxus and seeks to expand its influence.

name: Sylas
summary: Unshackled from Demacia, Sylas is a mage revolutionary. Stealing the magic of his captors, he fights for the oppressed and challenges the ruling order of Demacia.

name: Syndra
summary: Dark Sovereign from Ionia, Syndra is a powerful mage. Harnessing dark magic, she seeks to expand her power and control the forces that shape reality.

name: Tahm Kench
summary: River King from the Freljord, Tahm Kench is a cunning river demon. Using his vast appetite, he devours both the living and the unwary, accumulating their secrets.

name: Taliyah
summary: Stoneweaver from Shurima, Taliyah is an elemental mage. Manipulating the earth, she journeys to master her powers and reshape the world.

name: Talon
summary: Blade's Shadow from Noxus, Talon is a deadly assassin. Trained in the art of assassination, he serves Noxus and strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies.

name: Taric
summary: Shield of Valoran from Demacia, Taric is a protector of beauty. Wielding the power of the stars, he shields his allies and stands against darkness.

name: Teemo
summary: Swift Scout from Bandle City, Teemo is a mischievous yordle. Expert in guerilla warfare, he deploys traps and toxins to defend Bandle City from threats.

name: Thresh
summary: Chain Warden from the Shadow Isles, Thresh is a sadistic collector. Wielding a lantern of souls, he traps and torments the spirits of the living and the dead.

name: Tristana
summary: Yordle Gunner from Bandle City, Tristana is an explosive artillery yordle. With her trusty cannon, Boomer, she defends Bandle City from any threat.

name: Trundle
summary: Troll King from the Freljord, Trundle is a cunning troll. Using his wit and might, he seeks to expand his domain and assert his dominance in the Freljord.

name: Tryndamere
summary: Barbarian King from the Freljord, Tryndamere is a fearsome warrior. Driven by rage, he wields a massive sword and seeks to conquer all who oppose him.

name: Twisted Fate
summary: Card Master from the Freljord, Twisted Fate is a gambler and mage. Wielding magical cards, he seeks fortune and adventure on the unpredictable streets of Runeterra.

name: Twitch
summary: Plague Rat from Zaun, Twitch is a devious vermin. Infected by Zaun's toxic sludge, he spreads chaos and disease, ambushing enemies with his venomous attacks.

name: Udyr
summary: Spirit Walker from Ionia, Udyr is a primal warrior. Channeling the power of the animal spirits, he embraces the wilds and seeks balance in the natural order.

name: Urgot
summary: Dreadnought from Noxus, Urgot is a monstrous war machine. Transformed and augmented by Noxian techmaturgy, he seeks to enforce Noxus's will on the battlefield.

name: Varus
summary: Arrow of Retribution from Ionia, Varus is a corrupted archer. Bound by dark magic, he seeks revenge on those who betrayed and transformed him into a living weapon.

name: Vayne
summary: Night Hunter from Demacia, Vayne is a relentless hunter. Driven by a personal vendetta, she seeks out and eliminates supernatural threats with her crossbow, Night Hunter.

name: Veigar
summary: Tiny Master of Evil from Bandle City, Veigar is an ambitious yordle. Obsessed with power, he wields dark magic to grow in strength and conquer his foes.

name: Vel'Koz
summary: Eye of the Void from the Void, Vel'Koz is a voidborn entity. Driven by insatiable curiosity, he analyzes and disintegrates all in his path to understand the nature of the universe.

name: Vi
summary: Piltover Enforcer from Piltover, Vi is a brash enforcer. With her gauntlets, Hextech fists, she delivers powerful punches and seeks justice on the turbulent streets of Piltover.

name: Viego
summary: Ruined King from the Shadow Isles, Viego is a tormented king. Consumed by the Black Mist, he seeks to reunite with his lost queen, destroying everything in his path.

name: Viktor
summary: Machine Herald from Zaun, Viktor is a visionary inventor. Augmenting his body with hextech, he seeks to transcend humanity and bring progress to the people of Zaun.

name: Vladimir
summary: Crimson Reaper from Noxus, Vladimir is a vampiric sorcerer. Manipulating blood magic, he sustains his immortality and seeks power within the heart of Noxus.

name: Volibear
summary: Relentless Storm from the Freljord, Volibear is a thunderous demigod. Embodying the power of the storm, he defends the Freljord from all who threaten its sacred lands.

name: Warwick
summary: Uncaged Wrath of Zaun from Zaun, Warwick is a relentless predator. Experimented on with toxic chemicals, he hunts the streets of Zaun, seeking those who deserve punishment.

name: Wukong
summary: Monkey King from Ionia, Wukong is a nimble warrior. With his staff, Wuju, he excels in agility and guerrilla tactics, defending Ionia from those who seek to harm it.

name: Xayah
summary: Rebel from Ionia, Xayah is a determined vastaya. Partnered with Rakan, she wields deadly feathers and fights to free her people from oppression.

name: Xerath
summary: Magus Ascendant from Shurima, Xerath is a mage of pure energy. Imprisoned in a magical sarcophagus, he seeks to break free and unleash his power upon the world.

name: Xin Zhao
summary: Seneschal of Demacia from Demacia, Xin Zhao is a loyal warrior. Wielding his spear, he defends Demacia with honor and seeks to preserve the values of his homeland.

name: Yasuo
summary: Unforgiven from Ionia, Yasuo is a wandering swordsman. Framed for a crime he did not commit, he seeks redemption and battles to clear his name on the windswept plains of Ionia.

name: Yone
summary: Spirit of the Wind from Ionia, Yone is a skilled swordsman. Brother to Yasuo, he returns from the afterlife to seek redemption and confront the demons of his past.

name: Yorick
summary: Shepherd of Souls from the Shadow Isles, Yorick is a gravedigger. Commanding the dead, he seeks to free the souls trapped in the Black Mist and restore the balance of life and death.

name: Yuumi
summary: Magical Cat from Bandle City, Yuumi is a magical cat. Bonded to her magical book, Book, she assists her allies with spells and explores the world through her companions.

name: Zac
summary: Secret Weapon from Zaun, Zac is a blob of living liquid. Created in a Zaun lab, he stretches and molds his form to capture and neutralize threats to the city-state.

name: Zed
summary: Master of Shadows from Ionia, Zed is a deadly assassin. Mastering shadow techniques, he seeks power and vengeance against those who betrayed his order in Ionia.

name: Ziggs
summary: Hexplosives Expert from Zaun, Ziggs is a manic inventor. Obsessed with explosives, he gleefully causes chaos and destruction with his volatile creations.

name: Zilean
summary: Chronokeeper from Icathia, Zilean is a time mage. Manipulating the flow of time, he guards the temporal balance and aids those who seek to alter their destinies.

name: Zoe
summary: Aspect of Twilight from Mount Targon, Zoe is a mischievous celestial being. Wielding cosmic powers, she revels in chaos and brings unpredictability to the mortal realm.

name: Zyra
summary: Rise of the Thorns from the Freljord, Zyra is a deadly plant mage. Born from the corruption of the Freljord, she spreads her vines and controls nature to assert her dominance.
